column4: hello everybody! I accidentally deleted the apache2 folder from /etc and now my system is not starting as it should anymore... It doesn't open the desktop, instead i just geht the fullscreen command terminal which asks me to login
is this caused by apache? or something else? can I return to the desktop?
sounds like a borked xorg.conf.  Log into the shell and issue sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
should I use kernel framebuffer defice interface?
